BasicInfo.short: ItsOn provides a cloud-based smart services platform for mobile device OEMs, device OS developers, service providers and M2M developers.

Products.name: Zact
Products.description: Zact is a new smart mobile service introduced by parent company, ItsOn. Started by world leading pioneers in the wireless field, Greg
